title: Football : Bermuda Defeated By Guatemala
body_text:
Football: Bermuda Defeated By Guatemala
Bermuda was defeated 4-1 by Guatemala in the 2025/26 Concacaf W Qualifiers on Monday at Estadio El Trébol.
The Concacaf match report said, “The 2025/26 Concacaf W Qualifiers continued with Guatemala earning a 4-1 win over Bermuda in Group C on Monday at Estadio El Trébol in Guatemala City, Guatemala.
“María Monterroso handed Guatemala the lead in the 5’, heading home a precise delivery into the box from Ana Martínez following a corner.
“Dina Polanco struck from close range to double the lead for the hosts in the 15’.
“Monterroso secured her brace in the 61’ with a stunning long-range strike to further extend Guatemala’s advantage.
“Martínez converted an attempt from the penalty spot in the 77’ to score the fourth goal of the night for Las Chapinas.
“Eva Frazzoni shortened the deficit for Bermuda in the 78’ with a header from inside the box. Kenni Thompson provided the cross on the play.
“Guatemala will host Grenada at the end of February. Bermuda will resume its qualifying campaign against Costa Rica during the March fixtures.”
